Visualizing and Manipulating Quantum Materials

at the Ã…tomic Scale

The Microscopy of Quantum Materials lab aims to visualize, understand and manipulate quantum materials at the atomic scale. The lab is located at the Rowland Institute at Harvard in Cambridge, MA.
